Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Southbound Reroute near South Chicago/Greenwood
ShortDescription: Southbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 75th, Greenwood and 75th: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 75th, Greenwood, 75th and over regular route: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Greenwood.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ashland/90th
ShortDescription: NB 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 87th & Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/90th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 95th, Vincennes, 87th, then resume their normal route on Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/90th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near California/63rd
ShortDescription: Revised: NB 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 63rd, Western, 59th & California, due to street blockage near California/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 63rd, Western, 59th, then resume their normal route on California, due to street blockage near California/63rd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Cermak/Central
ShortDescription: Eastbound 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Austin,16th, Laramie and Cermak: due to, fire department activity near Cermak/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

 

Eastbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Austin,16th, Laramie, Cermak and over regular route: due to, fire department activity near Cermak/Central.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Chicago
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Chicago due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Chicago due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Addison and UIC-Halsted to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#8 Halsted

#9 Ashland

#56 Milwaukee

#65 Grand

#66 Chicago

#70 Division

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near California
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near California due to a loss of power on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near California due to a loss of power on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
